infotexts.entitydescription.remiliagear: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖The spilled blood has turned this dress crimson, hence the name “Scarlet Devil.”‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Remilia_Plus: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖The spilled blood has turned this dress crimson, hence the name “Scarlet Devil.”‖color:end‖\n‖color:150,150,150,255‖Note: Check the talent tab when wearing it~‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Remilia_Eclipse_Annive: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖The spilled blood has turned this dress crimson, hence the name “Scarlet Devil.”‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)

‖color:255,36,0,255‖The spilled blood has turned this dress crimson, hence the name “Scarlet Devil.”‖color:end‖\n‖color:150,150,150,255‖Note: Check the talent tab when wearing it~‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.remiliadecalmask: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖Surprisingly nice to wear on the face.‖color:end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.demonkingcradle:
When wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Remilia Outfit+‖end‖ and using ‖color:gui.orange‖Premium Type-B Blood‖end‖ you gain: 
Continuous healing of ‖color:gui.orange‖Bite Wounds‖end‖.
‖color:gui.green‖+15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Movement Speed‖end‖.
Gain ‖color:gui.orange‖Psychosis Resistance‖end‖. ———————————————————————————————————— 
More prone to bleeding 
If you go long without Premium Type-B Blood, your ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack Damage, Skill Level, and Max Health‖end‖ are each reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ 
Killing any creature restores ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bloodloss and Bleeding‖end‖ During a patrol, the more damage you take, the more damage you deal, up to ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. This effect clears after the patrol Each time you inflict total bleeding there is a chance to convert it into ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Bloodloss‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.green‖150%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Severe Bleeding‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.green‖33.3%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Bite Wounds‖end‖. 
Cannot benefit from the talent ‖color:gui.orange‖“Excessive Bleeding”‖end‖ 

‖color:150,150,150,255‖Remilia follows the same rule, a serious egoist. Type-B blood is the most delicious.

— “Imperishable Night”‖color:end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Demon_King_Cradle: “It would be even better with Sakuya’s black tea~”
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Blood_Needs_Remili: In urgent need of fresh blood.
infotexts.entitydescription.youmugear: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener working at Hakugyokurou. Half-human, half-phantom—half alive and half dead, half corporeal and half ethereal. A half-and-half being… but she does wield two swords.\n— “Immaterial and Missing Power”‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Plus: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener working at Hakugyokurou. Half-human, half-phantom—half alive and half dead, half corporeal and half ethereal. A half-and-half being… but she does wield two swords.\n— “Immaterial and Missing Power”‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Skirt: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener working at Hakugyokurou. Half-human, half-phantom—half alive and half dead, half corporeal and half ethereal. A half-and-half being… but she does wield two swords.\n— “Immaterial and Missing Power”‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Skirt_Plus: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener working at Hakugyokurou. Half-human, half-phantom—half alive and half dead, half corporeal and half ethereal. A half-and-half being… but she does wield two swords.\n— “Immaterial and Missing Power”‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentdescription.Life_And_Death_Half_Ha: When wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Youmu Outfit+‖end‖: The lower your health, the lower the damage you deal, to a minimum of ‖color:gui.red‖15%‖end‖. Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖Melee Damage‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖. Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖Walking Speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. Based on your Weapons skill, increase ‖color:gui.orange‖Ranged Attack Speed‖end‖ by an amount equal to ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of that value. \nWhile holding both ‖color:gui.red‖Hakurouken‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖Roukanken‖end‖, gain a large damage bonus and further increased walking speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Ancient_Temple: There’s almost nothing she can’t cut.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Bai_Lou_And: Youmu Konpaku is a dual-wield master, bearing Roukanken, which can slay ten phantoms in one stroke, and Hakurouken, which can sever human bewilderment. Of course, both can also, plainly, cut.
infotexts.talentdescription.Casket_Of_Star:
When wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Marisa Outfit+‖end‖, you recover faster from ‖color:gui.yellow‖Physical Damage and Burns‖end‖: Each ranged attack slowly builds ‖color:gui.yellow‖Magic Overload‖end‖, which reduces your ‖color:gui.orange‖Max Health and Ranged Attack Speed‖end‖, up to ‖color:gui.red‖20%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Magic Overload‖end‖ recovers naturally over time; the lower your ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic‖end‖ skill, the faster ‖color:gui.yellow‖Overload‖end‖ accumulates. 
Increase total damage by ‖color:gui.green‖4%‖end‖, ranged damage by ‖color:gui.green‖4%‖end‖, non-turret projectile damage by ‖color:gui.green‖4%‖end‖, burn damage dealt by ‖color:gui.green‖4%‖end‖, and damage to non-humans by ‖color:gui.green‖4%‖end‖. 
Ranged projectiles have a ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ chance to additionally inflict ‖color:gui.yellow‖Dream Vanish‖end‖. 
Each time you open a wreck container, there is a 15% chance to find a ‖color:gui.orange‖Grimoire‖end‖. 
Wearing Marisa’s Hat slightly increases resistances and attack damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Magic_Overl: Scorching mana that needs time to cool down.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Marisa_Weapons: A girl living away from people, as is the magician’s lot. Her weapon is magic; life itself is but a game.
infotexts.entitydescription.ayagear:
‖color:255,255,255,255‖Shameimaru Aya is a crow tengu famed for her speed. Camera in hand, she races around Gensokyo recording all manner of curious happenings.
Though a crow tengu, outwardly she differs little from a human.
— “Perfect Memento in Strict Sense”‖color:end‖
(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Plus:
‖color:255,255,255,255‖Shameimaru Aya is a crow tengu famed for her speed. Camera in hand, she races around Gensokyo recording all manner of curious happenings.
Though a crow tengu, outwardly she differs little from a human.
— “Perfect Memento in Strict Sense”‖color:end‖
(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentdescription.Mysterious_Mountain: When wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Aya Outfit+‖end‖, Take ‖color:gui.red‖+25%‖end‖ damage while in water. Gain ‖color:gui.green‖+30%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Swim Speed‖end‖. Upon completing any mission, obtain the ‖color:gui.orange‖Bunbunmaru Newspaper‖end‖; if both ‖color:gui.orange‖Helm and Medical‖end‖ skills exceed 70, additionally receive ‖color:gui.orange‖Aya’s Press Badge‖end‖. In dry environments, gain an extra ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ movement speed and ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ skill gain rate, and ‖color:gui.green‖+10%‖end‖ attack speed. Based on your ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic‖end‖ skill, increase ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack Speed‖end‖ by an additional ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of that value. \n\n‖color:150,150,150,255‖As a reporter, her work is to chronicle interesting incidents. Issues are published irregularly—often five times a month—and each is quite short. It’s more like something the youkai and humans of Gensokyo sip with black tea on a dull afternoon to pass the time.‖color:end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Wind_God_Girl: Reading more papers keeps you up to date on current events.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aya_Weapons: Aya possesses the ability to manipulate wind, which she wields with a ceremonial fan.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_gear: ‖color:255,81,75,255‖Reimu Hakurei is the current shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine in Gensokyo. ————“Touhou Hisoutensoku”. She usually resides at the shrine and appears throughout Gensokyo—and even beyond—whenever incidents arise.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_Plus: ‖color:255,81,75,255‖Reimu Hakurei is the current shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine in Gensokyo. ————“Touhou Hisoutensoku”. She usually resides at the shrine and appears throughout Gensokyo—and even beyond—whenever incidents arise.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_Eclipse_Annivers: ‖color:255,81,75,255‖Reimu Hakurei is the current shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine in Gensokyo. ————“Touhou Hisoutensoku”. She usually resides at the shrine and appears throughout Gensokyo—and even beyond—whenever incidents arise.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)

‖color:255,81,75,255‖Reimu Hakurei is the current shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine in Gensokyo. ————“Touhou Hisoutensoku”. She usually resides at the shrine and appears throughout Gensokyo—and even beyond—whenever incidents arise.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentdescription.Innocent_Treasures: When wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Reimu's Outfit+‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Swim Speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Walk Speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ damage to non-human creatures and +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ armor penetration. Attacks causing ‖color:gui.yellow‖Laceration/Gunshot/Blunt/Bite‖end‖ have a ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ chance to convert that damage into ‖color:gui.yellow‖Deep Tissue Damage‖end‖. \n‖color:gui.red‖No bonus effects from exclusive weapons‖end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.RedAndWhite: Reimu Hakurei, the ever-present shrine maiden of Gensokyo’s Hakurei Shrine.
infotexts.afflictionname.Reimu_Weapons: Shrine Maiden of the Hakurei Shrine
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reimu_Weapons: Long black hair to her waist, a large red bow on the back of her head, and twin sidelocks bound in red-and-white ribbons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Akyuu_gear: ‖color:193,204,65,255‖The “Ninth-Generation Scholar,” often borrowing books from Suzunaan, with a perfect photographic memory—known as the “Memory of Gensokyo.”‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Akyuu_Plus: ‖color:193,204,65,255‖The “Ninth-Generation Scholar,” often borrowing books from Suzunaan, with a perfect photographic memory—known as the “Memory of Gensokyo.”‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Camellia_Hair_Accessor: A beautiful camellia hair ornament made from real flowers, exquisitely crafted. Wearing it is said to completely cure forgetfulness.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Memory_Of_Gensokyo: Akyuu has shoulder-length purple hair with a camellia flower on the left side as a hair ornament.
infotexts.talentdescription.Savant:
When wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Akyuu Outfit+‖end‖: \n‖color:gui.red‖–20%‖end‖ movement speed and ‖color:gui.red‖–20%‖end‖ Max HP ‖color:gui.orange‖Melee attack damage‖end‖ –‖color:gui.red‖25%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Ranged attack damage‖end‖ –‖color:gui.red‖15%‖end‖ \n‖color:gui.red‖Reading “Perfect Memento in Strict Sense” or “The Gensokyo Chronicles” has no effect.‖end‖ Combine “Perfect Memento in Strict Sense”, “The Gensokyo Chronicles”, and “Bunbunmaru Newspaper” at the Fabricator to craft ‖color:gui.red‖“Deep Gensokyo Knowledge”‖end‖ to gain the full bonus.
After completing all missions in a total of ‖color:gui.green‖9‖end‖ campaign runs: Completing ‖color:gui.orange‖any mission‖end‖ grants ‖color:gui.orange‖“Perfect Memento in Strict Sense” (Europa exclusive)‖end‖. Completing ‖color:gui.orange‖any mission with no deaths‖end‖ grants ‖color:gui.orange‖“The Gensokyo Chronicles” (Europa exclusive)‖end‖. +‖color:gui.green‖80%‖end‖ skill gain speed +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ medical item effectiveness +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ projectile damage vs. non-human enemies After a total of ‖color:gui.green‖33‖end‖ campaign runs, the original movement speed and Max HP penalties are removed, +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖. Count resets upon death.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Akyuu_Weapons: As a child of the Hieda family’s Mikoto line, she is brilliant and far more knowledgeable than most of her clan, but physically frail.
infotexts.entitydescription.Mokou_gear: ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Once a noble’s daughter, she became an immortal after taking the Hourai Elixir left by Kaguya Houraisan. Upon meeting Kaguya again, she entered an endless cycle of daily battles with her.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Mokou_Plus: ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Once a noble’s daughter, she became an immortal after taking the Hourai Elixir left by Kaguya Houraisan. Upon meeting Kaguya again, she entered an endless cycle of daily battles with her.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentdescription.Immortal_Human: While wearing ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Mokou's Outfit+‖end‖: • Max health ‖color:gui.red‖−10%‖end‖. • Once per mission cycle, if health reaches zero you gain ‖color:gui.green‖5 s of consciousness‖end‖ during which wounds heal rapidly but movement speed and damage are reduced. • Burn damage dealt ‖color:gui.green‖+10%‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictionname.Mokou_Weapons: Immortal Guide of the Bamboo Forest
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Mokou_Weapons: If the soul separates from the body, the body is destroyed and the soul forms a new one in a place it favors. Though deathless, she still feels hunger and pain.
infotexts.entitydescription.Patchouli_gear: ‖color:120,75,100,255‖A witch living in the Scarlet Devil Mansion’s great underground library, highly skilled in magic. She spends most of her time reading and creating new spells, recording them in grimoires.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Patchouli_Plus: ‖color:120,75,100,255‖A witch living in the Scarlet Devil Mansion’s great underground library, highly skilled in magic. She spends most of her time reading and creating new spells, recording them in grimoires.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentdescription.Knowledge_And_Solitude:
When wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Patchouli Outfit+‖end‖: The lower your HP, the faster the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Asthma‖end‖ affliction progresses: Cannot sprint on land and walking speed –‖color:gui.red‖20%‖end‖ (Sprint restriction can be lifted when Magic Boost reaches 300, when using MEID, or when wearing the required Pendulum Necklace). More prone to injury and bleeding. ‖color:gui.orange‖Melee attack damage‖end‖ –‖color:gui.red‖100%‖end‖. Max HP –‖color:gui.red‖25%‖end‖.
‖color:gui.orange‖Swim speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.orange‖Skill gain speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. +‖color:gui.green‖300%‖end‖ to all five elemental effects, and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖projectile damage‖end‖ against enemies afflicted with any of the five elements. Based on current ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic Ability‖end‖, gain +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖ranged attack damage‖end‖ (max +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖). +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ damage to targets not yet attacked. +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ armor penetration to targets already attacked.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.The_Still_Library: Appears human but is frail, pale, and floats lightly; suffers from asthma and anemia.
infotexts.afflictionname.Patchouli_Weapons: The Witch of the Scarlet Devil Mansion
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Weapons: A close friend of Remilia, often indulging her whimsical requests and calling each other by affectionate nicknames.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_1: No breathing difficulty yet—keep it at this stage if possible.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_2: Early symptoms: itchy throat, coughing, chest tightness, or shortness of breath—signs the asthma is worsening.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_3: Symptoms sharply worsen: rapid breathing, chest tightness, and intense coughing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_4: Condition improving, but without treatment it could become dangerous again.
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_gear: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖A member of the Hinanawi clan who manipulates the keystone “Yao Stone,” calming or causing earthquakes by driving it in or pulling it out. Capable of ground-collapsing, mountain-shattering disasters that shake all of Gensokyo.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_Plus: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖A member of the Hinanawi clan who manipulates the keystone “Yao Stone,” calming or causing earthquakes by driving it in or pulling it out. Capable of ground-collapsing, mountain-shattering disasters that shake all of Gensokyo.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_Hat: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖“If the hat were bare it’d look too plain, so I added a peach.”‖color:end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.TenshiTalent: While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Tenshi's Outfit+‖end‖: • Melee attackers briefly flee after striking you. • Ranged attack speed ‖color:gui.red‖−15%‖end‖. • Effect of ‖color:gui.orange‖Elegance Stripping‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖+35%‖end‖. • Max health ‖color:gui.green‖+15%‖end‖. • Resistance to ‖color:gui.orange‖Elegance Stripping‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖+40%‖end‖. • Hitting a target afflicted with Elegance Stripping also slows them. • Eating a heavenly peach reduces all damage taken by 50% for ‖color:gui.green‖10 s‖end‖ (1-minute cooldown).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.The_Daughter_Of_He: A teenage celestial with crimson eyes and long blue hair curling slightly at the ends, wearing a black top-hat adorned with an edible peach and peach leaves.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Tenshi_Weapons: Though lacking a true celestial’s temperament, Tenshi possesses their physical traits: a body so tough blades cannot pierce it, and flesh poisonous to youkai.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Tenshi_Blood: The blood of a celestial is deadly poison to youkai.
infotexts.entitydescription.Momizi_gear: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Usually waits inside the Kuuten Waterfall. Because intruders to Youkai Mountain are rare, she spends her idle time playing shogi with equally idle kappa nearby.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Momizi_Plus: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Usually waits inside the Kuuten Waterfall. Because intruders to Youkai Mountain are rare, she spends her idle time playing shogi with equally idle kappa nearby.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentdescription.MomiziTalent: While wearing Momiji's Outfit+, you gain higher resistance to Bites. Burn damage taken is increased by ‖color:gui.red‖30%‖end‖ Maximum health increased by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ When enemies are nearby, you gain Alertness, raising ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ walking speed, ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ swimming speed, and ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ melee attack speed. After taking damage, briefly gain increased physical damage resistance and ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ melee attack damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Grunt_Security_Ten: A tengu patrolling Youkai Mountain. With excellent vision and sense of smell, she can instantly detect intruders.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Momizi_Weapons: Momiji possesses vision that reaches for miles and an excellent sense of smell, allowing her to detect intruders instantly.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Grunt_Security_Ten: Presence of a non-human detected nearby.
infotexts.entitydescription.Yuka_gear: ‖color:117,128,110,255‖Yuka lives in the Sunflower Field and eliminates any humans or youkai who intrude and disturb her. Due to her long life, she seldom leaves the field recently. She loves flowers that bloom seasonally and lives surrounded by natural flowers year-round, striving to have blossoms in every season.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Yuka_Plus: ‖color:117,128,110,255‖Yuka lives in the Sunflower Field and eliminates any humans or youkai who intrude and disturb her. Due to her long life, she seldom leaves the field recently. She loves flowers that bloom seasonally and lives surrounded by natural flowers year-round, striving to have blossoms in every season.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentname.Lord_Of_Flowers: Lord of the Four Seasons' Flowers
infotexts.talentdescription.Lord_Of_Flowers: While wearing Yuka's Outfit+, you gain increased resistance to poison and bleeding. Damage dealt to non-humans is reduced by ‖color:gui.red‖10%‖end‖ Melee attack damage increased by ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ Each cycle grants a sunflower seed. Sunflowers randomly drop various petals, each providing different buffs when used.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Flowers_Of_Four_Se: A youkai residing in Gensokyo with the ability to manipulate flowers, striving to keep them blooming all year round.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Yuka_Weapons: Yuka can manipulate flowers: making them bloom, turning sunflowers to the sun, and reviving withered blossoms.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal01: The power within becomes more concentrated, increasing damage dealt.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal02: The body becomes light, drifting like a petal on the wind.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal03: Vigorous vitality flows through the body, making it more resistant to injury.
infotexts.entitydescription.Aunn_gear: ‖color:162,190,160,255‖Aunn seeks out and silently guards places where human faith gathers. She rarely shows herself and attacks only when hostility appears, but since she is not strong, she often loses. Every summer, she is especially favored by frogs.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Aunn_Plus: ‖color:162,190,160,255‖Aunn seeks out and silently guards places where human faith gathers. She rarely shows herself and attacks only when hostility appears, but since she is not strong, she often loses. Every summer, she is especially favored by frogs.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentdescription.AunnTalent: While wearing Aunn's Outfit+, you gain higher resistance to spiritual pressure and mental effects. Damage to humans ‖color:gui.red‖−10%‖end‖ Bite damage ‖color:gui.green‖+15%‖end‖ Damage to crew reduced to ‖color:gui.green‖75%‖end‖ of normal. \nOnce per cycle, choose between two states: Lion / Komainu. Komainu: Single-use. Crew nearby gain the ‖color:gui.orange‖Guardian Beast‖end‖ effect, which grants ‖color:gui.green‖+10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical damage and mental resistance‖end‖, reduces friendly-fire damage by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖, and adds ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ temporary vitality. Lion: ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical damage resistance‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖−10%‖end‖; ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage, attack speed, and movement speed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖+10%‖end‖; damage to hostile entities (red names) further ‖color:gui.green‖+10%‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Naivete_Koma_Inu: Though a komainu, she embodies both lion and komainu traits, a dual-natured divine beast whose inner ferocity and peace coexist.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aunn_Lion: Represents springtime vigor, bravery, and a carefree yet formidable presence.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aunn_Koma_Inu: Designed as a single being embodying a pair of guardian beasts; not a split personality.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aunn_Koma_Inu_Othe: A guardian beast watches over you nearby, filling you with confidence.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aunn_Weapons: Aunn has long green hair down to her hips, with mane-like curled bangs and shoulder-length locks, and a single gray horn atop her head.
infotexts.entitydescription.Flandre_gear: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Flandre lives in the Scarlet Devil Mansion’s basement and rarely goes outside. Although the others in the mansion restrict her from leaving because of her dangerous powers and unstable mind, in truth Flandre simply feels comfortable living there and chooses to stay.‖color:end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)

infotexts.talentdescription.FlandreTalent2: When wearing Flandre Outfit+: If HP >‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖, an additional ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ chance to deal +‖color:gui.green‖49.5%‖end‖ ranged damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.FlandreTalent3: When wearing Flandre Outfit+: Debuff resistance +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. If an allied crew member is adjacent, +‖color:gui.green‖66‖end‖ Medical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.FlandreTalent4: When wearing Flandre Outfit+: Buff duration +30%. While unarmed and crouching (default Ctrl), gain a shield reducing incoming damage by 70%. Movement speed −‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖ and attack damage −‖color:gui.green‖100%‖end‖ during shielding. Shield lasts ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖ sec, regenerates 1 sec of duration per second. After depletion, regenerates after ‖color:gui.green‖30‖end‖ sec.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Younger_Sister_Of_: Flandre is Remilia Scarlet’s younger sister. She adores her elder sister but seldom meets her, and is usually cared for along with Remilia by head maid Sakuya Izayoi.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Flandre_Weapons: Flandre is Remilia Scarlet’s younger sister. She adores her elder sister but seldom meets her, and is usually cared for along with Remilia by head maid Sakuya Izayoi.
infotexts.entitydescription.Nue_gear: ‖color:90,80,100,255‖Whenever she sees someone working enthusiastically, she can’t help but secretly obstruct them—that’s just her nature. She once lived leisurely underground and returned above after the geyser incident. Now a disciple at Myouren Temple following Byakuren Hijiri, she remains slightly out of place among other youkai.‖end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Nue_Plus: ‖color:90,80,100,255‖Whenever she sees someone working enthusiastically, she can’t help but secretly obstruct them—that’s just her nature. She once lived leisurely underground and returned above after the geyser incident. Now a disciple at Myouren Temple following Byakuren Hijiri, she remains slightly out of place among other youkai.‖end‖\n(Built-in scanner slot)
infotexts.talentdescription.NueTalent:

When health falls below half, increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ resistance to physical, burn, and debuff effects and movement speed. 
Each time a crew member kills ‖color:gui.orange‖1‖end‖ creature, gain ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ count; when you kill ‖color:gui.orange‖1‖end‖ creature, gain ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ counts; completing a mission grants ‖color:gui.green‖6‖end‖ counts. Counts grant buffs: 154 counts: +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ skill gain speed, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ movement speed. 312 counts: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ experience gain, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ max health. 468 counts: +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ buff duration, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ attack speed. 624 counts: +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖swimming speed, and increases damage dealt to creatures afflicted with Endless Nightmare by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Unconfirmed_Fantas: A youkai subdued many times, each legend portraying her differently. Yet they are only legends: in truth, she has never appeared before humans, simply enjoying their fear and the stories they invent about her.
infotexts.afflictionname.Unconfirmed_Fantasy_Flyin: Mystery of the Unknown Darkness – Stage 1
Mystery of the Unknown Darkness – Stage 2
Mystery of the Unknown Darkness – Stage 3
Mystery of the Unknown Darkness – Stage 4
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Nue_Weapons: The youkai of Myouren Temple are united around Byakuren Hijiri and trust one another. As a later joiner, however, Nue stands in a subtle position, often appearing idle outside the temple.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Unconfirmed_Fantas: When health falls below 50%, resistances increase.
infotexts.entitydescription.Piece_gear: Piece is a subordinate of Hecatia Lapislazuli, loyal yet with her own ideas, calling Hecatia “Master.” After the events of Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom, she was sent by Hecatia to live in Gensokyo, befriending the three light fairies—Sunny Milk, Luna Child, and Star Sapphire—for pranks, later also befriending Cirno and Eternity Larva.
infotexts.entitydescription.Piece_Plus: Piece is a subordinate of Hecatia Lapislazuli, loyal yet with her own ideas, calling Hecatia “Master.” After the events of Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom, she was sent by Hecatia to live in Gensokyo, befriending the three light fairies—Sunny Milk, Luna Child, and Star Sapphire—for pranks, later also befriending Cirno and Eternity Larva.
infotexts.talentdescription.PieceTalent: While wearing Piece's Outfit+, gain slight burn resistance. Higher insanity increases ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage, attack speed, and friendly-fire damage‖end‖—up to ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ for attack damage and speed, and ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ for friendly-fire damage. \nTargets with higher insanity take up to ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ more damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Fairy_Of_Hell: Under Hecatia's orders, she filled the Sea of Tranquility with fairies from Hell.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Piece_Weapons: When Piece channels power into her torch, anyone who sees its flames will go mad.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cirno_gear: Even in summer, extreme cold can appear around the lakeside. The fairy you meet then is likely the ice fairy Cirno, the boss of the Misty Lake fairies and stronger than the others.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cirno_Plus: Even in summer, extreme cold can appear around the lakeside. The fairy you meet then is likely the ice fairy Cirno, the boss of the Misty Lake fairies and stronger than the others.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cirno_Eclipse_Valentin: Even in summer, extreme cold can appear around the lakeside. The fairy you meet then is likely the ice fairy Cirno, the boss of the Misty Lake fairies and stronger than the others.
Even in summer, extreme cold can appear around the lakeside. The fairy you meet then is likely the ice fairy Cirno, the boss of the Misty Lake fairies and stronger than the others.
A sweet and refreshing mint accessory topped with a slice of lemon.
infotexts.talentdescription.CirnoTalent: While wearing Cirno's Outfit+, you have low burn resistance. Deals an extra ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ freeze damage. Skill acquisition speed ‖color:gui.red‖−50%‖end‖. When in water, gain ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖, while gradually healing some wounds. \nWhen using magic melee weapons, each attack inflicts ‖color:gui.green‖4–8‖end‖ points of ‖color:gui.orange‖Freeze‖end‖, scaling with weapon crafting difficulty. \nRanged barrages (non-turret) against enemies over half health have a ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖ chance to apply minor ‖color:gui.orange‖Freeze‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Fairy_Of_Ice: A battle-loving fairy with a bit of a silly mind—but she is, after all, just a child.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Cirno_Weapons: The leader of the lake’s fairies, stronger than the rest.
infotexts.entitydescription.Nitori_Gear: ‖color:52,94,60,255‖As a kappa, she is keenly attuned to business opportunities. Whenever a large-scale festival or gathering occurs in Gensokyo, kappa merchants—including her—are often present selling goods. ————"Bestiary of Humans and Youkai"‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Nitori_Plus: ‖color:52,94,60,255‖As a kappa, she is keenly attuned to business opportunities. Whenever a large-scale festival or gathering occurs in Gensokyo, kappa merchants—including her—are often present selling goods. ————"Bestiary of Humans and Youkai"‖color:end‖

While wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Nitori's Outfit+‖end‖, In dry environments, drug effectiveness ‖color:gui.red‖−15%‖end‖. 
While in water and with ‖color:gui.orange‖Mechanical Engineering‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Electrical Engineering‖end‖ both above ‖color:gui.green‖60‖end‖, slowly heal wounds. 
Gain ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ extra swimming speed. 
Based on the combined level of ‖color:gui.orange‖Mechanical Engineering‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Electrical Engineering‖end‖, increase ‖color:gui.green‖16%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖repair speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖hull repair speed‖end‖. 
Based on ‖color:gui.orange‖Mechanical Engineering‖end‖ level, increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖ranged attack damage‖end‖. 
When opening wreck containers, ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ chance to find simple parts and ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ chance to find precision parts. 
When opening beacon station containers, ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ chance to find precision parts. 
Repaired devices become significantly harder to break. 
Gain a ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ discount when trading with merchant vessels.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Candid_Friend: A kappa skilled in commerce and fiercely protective of her wealth.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Nitori_Weapons: Shy and timid, she flees immediately when approached by humans or other youkai while alone.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Nitori_Tools: Only among her peers does she reveal a bright and lively side.
infotexts.entitydescription.Koishi_gear: Koishi is a paradoxical figure, born as a being without a defined character, a denial of character itself. Although she tries to avoid others’ malice to prevent being disliked, she still harbors much that is naturally off-putting and carries a certain darkness within.
infotexts.entitydescription.Koishi_Plus: Koishi is a paradoxical figure, born as a being without a defined character, a denial of character itself. Although she tries to avoid others’ malice to prevent being disliked, she still harbors much that is naturally off-putting and carries a certain darkness within.
infotexts.entitydescription.Koishi_Hat: Has no one noticed me? Well then, this makes things easier.
infotexts.entitydescription.Koishi_Eclipse_Valenti: Koishi is a paradoxical figure, born as a being without a defined character, a denial of character itself. Although she tries to avoid others’ malice to prevent being disliked, she still harbors much that is naturally off-putting and carries a certain darkness within.

Has no one noticed me? Well then, this makes things easier.
infotexts.talentdescription.KoishiTalent:
While wearing Koishi's Outfit+: 
Gain ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ more experience from missions but reduce ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖. ‖color:gui.orange‖Ranged and explosive damage‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖−30%‖end‖, but ‖color:gui.orange‖melee damage‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖+30%‖end‖. 
Every random interval ‖color:gui.green‖(15–30s)‖end‖, gain the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Unconscious‖end‖ effect of random duration ‖color:gui.green‖(5–15s)‖end‖ and random level ‖color:gui.green‖(1–3)‖end‖. 
When hit, gain a level of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Unconscious‖end‖ based on remaining health, up to level ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖, leaving a phantom that briefly distracts enemies. 
With health above 75%/45% (for levels 2/3), you can manually trigger Unconscious at the cost of some health. 
‖color:gui.yellow‖Unconscious‖end‖: Reduces enemy detection range and aggression, increases stun and debuff resistance, and gradually boosts melee damage; the higher the level, the stronger the effect. 
While Unconscious, all damage taken is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖25.7%‖end‖; while not Unconscious, all damage taken increases by ‖color:gui.green‖51.4%‖end‖. All Unconscious effects end after attacking. 
Exclusive weapon attacks reduce, but do not immediately remove, Unconscious duration. 
Killing creatures slightly extends Unconscious duration. Wearing Koishi's Hat slightly extends Unconscious duration. 
Cannot benefit from the “Special Forces” talent.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Closed_Eyes_Of_Koi: She is a satori youkai with mind-reading abilities, but after closing her heart she lost this ability and instead gained the power to manipulate the unconscious.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Liberation_Of_Kois: Sacrifice maximum health to gain melee damage and Unconscious effects, but greatly reduce ranged attack damage and speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Koishi_Weapons: Because of her ability, she finds it hard to communicate normally and does not form complex relationships. She lives with her sister Satori Komeiji and her sister’s pets, Rin Kaenbyou and Utsuho Reiuji, with whom she is close.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Strange_Pho: Slightly reduces movement speed, physical damage, and stun resistance.
infotexts.entitydescription.Alice_gear: Alice lives alone in the Margatroid Manor of the Forest of Magic. She enjoys making dolls and is working on creating self-maintaining dolls, as well as writing grimoires. Although she seldom goes out, she performs doll shows at festivals.
infotexts.entitydescription.Alice_Plus: Alice lives alone in the Margatroid Manor of the Forest of Magic. She enjoys making dolls and is working on creating self-maintaining dolls, as well as writing grimoires. Although she seldom goes out, she performs doll shows at festivals.

When wearing Alice Outfit+: \n‖color:gui.orange‖Walk speed‖end‖ –‖color:gui.red‖10%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖ –‖color:gui.red‖10%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.orange‖Melee damage‖end‖ –‖color:gui.red‖35%‖end‖.
‖color:gui.orange‖Swim speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.orange‖Skill gain speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.orange‖Medical item effectiveness‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.orange‖Buff duration‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ projectile damage to creatures with HP between ‖color:gui.green‖30% and 70%‖end‖.
Holding the exclusive weapon or keeping the Doll Suitcase in the quickbar grants Doll Energy. You can spend Doll Energy to craft and summon ‖color:gui.yellow‖Dolls‖end‖. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Dolls‖end‖ near you gain enhanced resistance and attack damage. Each ‖color:gui.yellow‖Doll‖end‖ lasts no longer than 1 minute.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Puppeteer_Of_Seven: With golden hair and fair skin, she herself resembles a doll.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Alice_Weapons: Alice cares little for others but is devoted to magic. Though she appears strong, she has a delicate side. She is generally free-spirited, neither stubborn nor resentful. She likes solitude but often attends banquets and performs puppet shows at festivals.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sunny_gear: She is a sunlight fairy who has lived in Gensokyo since an unknown time. Together with Luna Child and Star Sapphire, she is known as one of the Three Fairies of Light.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sunny_Plus: She is a sunlight fairy who has lived in Gensokyo since an unknown time. Together with Luna Child and Star Sapphire, she is known as one of the Three Fairies of Light.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sunnu_Scary_Mask: Though meant for a test of courage, it hardly scares anyone.
infotexts.talentdescription.SunnyTalent:
While wearing Sunny's Outfit+: 
Gain resistance to ‖color:gui.yellow‖burns‖end‖. Harder for enemies to notice you. 
‖color:gui.yellow‖Burn‖end‖ damage dealt +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.

infotexts.afflictiondescription.Shining_Light_Of_T: She has shoulder-length orange hair tied into short twin tails with red bows and wears a white lace headband.
infotexts.entitydescription.Luna_gear: She is a moonlight fairy, one of the Three Fairies of Light alongside Sunny Milk and Star Sapphire, and the one most similar to a youkai.
infotexts.entitydescription.Luna_Plus: She is a moonlight fairy, one of the Three Fairies of Light alongside Sunny Milk and Star Sapphire, and the one most similar to a youkai.

While wearing Luna's Outfit+: 
Gain resistance to ‖color:gui.yellow‖stun‖end‖. Harder for enemies to detect you by sound. 
‖color:gui.yellow‖Stun‖end‖ damage dealt +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. 
‖color:gui.yellow‖Stun‖end‖ damage has a ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ chance to convert to ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blunt Force Trauma‖end‖ at ‖color:gui.green‖1000%‖end‖ or to ‖color:gui.yellow‖Deep Tissue Damage‖end‖ at ‖color:gui.green‖500%‖end‖.

infotexts.afflictiondescription.Tranquil_Light_Of_: She has shoulder-length straw-blond hair with three spiral curls on each side, wearing a white hat adorned with two black bows on each side.
infotexts.entitydescription.Star_gear: She is the Starlight Fairy, and no one knows when she began residing in Gensokyo. Together with Sunny Milk and Lunasa Prismriver, she is known as one of the Three Fairies of Light.
infotexts.entitydescription.Star_Plus: She is the Starlight Fairy, and no one knows when she began residing in Gensokyo. Together with Sunny Milk and Lunasa Prismriver, she is known as one of the Three Fairies of Light.
infotexts.talentdescription.StarTalent:
When you are wearing Star's Outfit+, 
Decrease ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖maximum health‖end‖. 
You can sense the location of living creatures around you. After a long time without taking damage, increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖maximum health‖end‖, reduce damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖, and significantly increase health recovery speed. 
Enemies who have dealt damage to you: When their health is below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, ranged barrages (non-turrets) have a ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ chance to cause additional ‖color:gui.yellow‖stun, burn, and Starlight‖end‖. The probability for melee weapons is ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖.

Attacking enemies with ‖color:gui.yellow‖Starlight‖end‖ deals an additional ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ damage, and killing enemies with Starlight will restore your ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical damage, burn, and bleed‖end‖. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Starlight‖end‖: Reduces creatures' physical damage resistance, attack damage, movement speed, and skill level.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Cascading_Light_Of: She has long dark brown hair reaching her waist, with a large blue bow on her head. The edges of the bow have white pleats in battle. She has brown eyes.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sakuya_gear: She is the head maid serving Remilia Scarlet in the Scarlet Devil Mansion, also doubling as the mansion's cleaner. She is the only human in the mansion.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sakuya_Plus: She is the head maid serving Remilia Scarlet in the Scarlet Devil Mansion, also doubling as the mansion's cleaner. She is the only human in the mansion.
infotexts.talentname.SakuyaTalent: Maid of the Scarlet Devil Mansion
infotexts.talentdescription.SakuyaTalent: When you are wearing Sakuya's Outfit+, All thrown knife barrages deal ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ more damage. Each attack has a ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖ chance to apply ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blood Clock‖end‖ to yourself. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blood Clock‖end‖ reduces your ‖color:gui.orange‖maximum health‖end‖, up to a maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. Killing a creature will remove ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blood Clock‖end‖. When ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blood Clock‖end‖ reaches ‖color:gui.green‖100%‖end‖, reduce ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed, attack damage, skill acquisition speed, and skill level‖end‖, and you cannot gain experience from cycles. ‖color:gui.red‖Blood Clock resets after a cycle‖end‖. Each thrown knife attack has a ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ chance to apply a small amount of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Moon Clock‖end‖, which reduces the target's ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed and physical damage resistance‖end‖. Dealing damage to enemies with ‖color:gui.yellow‖Moon Clock‖end‖ deals an additional ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ damage. When your character reaches the corresponding level, you gain different bonuses: ‖color:gui.red‖Level 4‖end‖: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖experience gain speed‖end‖, and increase crafting table usage speed by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Level 8‖end‖: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed and medicine effect‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Level 12‖end‖: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage and attack speed‖end‖, and reduce damage to allies by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Level 16‖end‖: If you have ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blood Clock‖end‖ and it is below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ skill level and reduce the spread of ranged attacks by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖; If ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blood Clock‖end‖ is above ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, increase ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖debuff resistance‖end‖, reduce damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, and increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖ranged damage‖end‖. You are not affected by the effects of the Moon Clock.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Perfect_And_Elegan: She has shoulder-length silver-gray hair. Except for Youmu Konpaku, her side hair is braided and tied with green ribbons at the ends, with the outer side hair reaching her chest. She wears a Katsura headpiece.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sakuya_Weapons: As the head maid, she spends most of her time in the Scarlet Devil Mansion, responsible for cleaning, assigning tasks, cooking, and serving the young lady, occasionally going out for shopping.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Luna_Clock_: The space around you seems to be frozen and unmovable.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sanae_gear: She is a human from the outside world, a shrine maiden, wind priestess, and a living god of the Tori Shrine.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sanae_Plus: She is a human from the outside world, a shrine maiden, wind priestess, and a living god of the Tori Shrine.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Sanae_Frog_Hair: In order to blend into the life of Gensokyo, Sanae quickly becomes free from common sense.
infotexts.talentdescription.SanaeTalent: When you are wearing Sanae's Outfit+, At the start of each cycle, a miracle is bestowed upon a random, conscious crewmate other than yourself. When your character level exceeds ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖, this can trigger twice. Wearing a talisman also gives you a random miracle. Twice per cycle, when a crewmate gains at least one skill point, you have a ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ chance to receive a random miracle. This effect has a cooldown of ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ minute regardless of whether it triggers successfully. When you have any miracle, the damage taken is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, and your ‖color:gui.orange‖maximum health‖end‖ is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. The lower your health, the more damage you take. This can increase damage taken by up to ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. \nMiracles: ‖color:gui.red‖Miracle of the Stars‖end‖: Increases ‖color:gui.orange‖skill acquisition speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and raises ‖color:gui.orange‖skill level‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Miracle of the Moon‖end‖: Increases ‖color:gui.orange‖repair speed and ship repair speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and raises ‖color:gui.orange‖stun resistance‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Miracle of the Sun‖end‖: Increases ‖color:gui.orange‖ranged attack damage‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖melee attack damage‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Miracle of the Mountains‖end‖: Increases ‖color:gui.orange‖maximum health‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ and raises the ‖color:gui.orange‖physical damage resistance‖end‖ of your legs by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Miracle of the Sea‖end‖: Increases ‖color:gui.orange‖swimming speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ and raises ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Miracle of the Sky‖end‖: Grants you ‖color:gui.green‖7‖end‖ random skill points and increases ‖color:gui.orange‖experience gain speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.red‖Miracle of the Wind‖end‖: Increases ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, raises ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, and reduces ‖color:gui.orange‖friendly fire‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Manifest_God_Of_Mi: Sanae has waist-length green hair and wears a frog hairpin. Her left hair is tied into a bundle with a snake hairpin.
infotexts.afflictionname.Sanae_Weapons: The Communicator of Wind and Lake
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sanae_Weapons: Sanae is the shrine maiden of Sanae Kochiya. The miracles of summoning wind and rain she performs with secret techniques are actually triggered by Sanae, the Wind God. Sanae also worships Izanami, and is a distant descendant of Izanami.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reisen_gear: Reisen was once a moon rabbit of the Watatsuki family in the Lunar Capital. When humans began their invasion of the Moon, she escaped and fled to Gensokyo, where she was adopted by Kaguya Houraisan.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reisen_Plus: Reisen was once a moon rabbit of the Watatsuki family in the Lunar Capital. When humans began their invasion of the Moon, she escaped and fled to Gensokyo, where she was adopted by Kaguya Houraisan.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reisen_Outfit: Reisen was once a moon rabbit of the Watatsuki family in the Lunar Capital. When humans began their invasion of the Moon, she escaped and fled to Gensokyo, where she was adopted by Kaguya Houraisan.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reisen_Outfit_Plus: Reisen was once a moon rabbit of the Watatsuki family in the Lunar Capital. When humans began their invasion of the Moon, she escaped and fled to Gensokyo, where she was adopted by Kaguya Houraisan.
infotexts.talentdescription.ReisenTalent: While wearing Reisen's Outfit+: Reduce ‖color:gui.red‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖maximum health‖end‖. Slightly increase resistance to ‖color:gui.yellow‖psychosis‖end‖. Your ranged barrages (non-turret) inflict extra ‖color:gui.yellow‖psychosis‖end‖. Damage taken from enemies with ‖color:gui.yellow‖psychosis‖end‖ −‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. When health is below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, you are harder to detect. Can actively trigger the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lunacy‖end‖ effect: while active, damage taken +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖, slowly converts your ‖color:gui.yellow‖psychosis‖end‖ into ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lunacy‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖skill level‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, ranged attack spread −‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖, and damage to enemies with ‖color:gui.yellow‖psychosis‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Lunatic_Moon_Rabbi: She has long light-purple hair down to her ankles and a pair of long, crumpled rabbit ears that bend from the middle. They look artificial but are actually real.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reisen_Weapons: She is now Kaguya Houraisan’s pet and, like the other rabbits, is affectionately called Inaba by Kaguya.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lunatic_Rei: The immense madness gathered in her crimson eyes is being unleashed.
infotexts.entitydescription.Yukari_gear: Yukari is the oldest youkai in Gensokyo and one of the sages who helped create it. She has long protected its safety and stability from the shadows.
infotexts.entitydescription.Yukari_Plus: Yukari is the oldest youkai in Gensokyo and one of the sages who helped create it. She has long protected its safety and stability from the shadows.
infotexts.talentdescription.YukariTalent: While wearing Yukari's Outfit+: All damage and status effects received −‖color:gui.green‖8%‖end‖, including buffs. ‖color:gui.orange‖Skill gain speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. Blunt damage you take converts to lacerations, gunshot wounds to bites, and deep tissue damage to internal injuries; when health less than ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖ this reverses. Damage you deal converts blunt→laceration, gunshot→bite, deep tissue→internal; reverses every ‖color:gui.green‖120‖end‖ seconds. Once per mission, you may teleport all conscious crew to the main submarine. Alternates every ‖color:gui.green‖120‖end‖ seconds between −‖color:gui.red‖10%‖end‖ attack damage and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ max health.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_The_Key_Of_Dual: While wearing Yukari's Outfit+: Each use of the Key of Duality switches states: Outer World: −30% friendly fire, +15% skill level, and the two most recently commanded crew gain +10% attack speed. Inner World: +30% friendly fire, −15% max health, +20% damage dealt.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Realm_Of_Fantasy: She has long, slightly wavy golden hair down to her waist, decorated with several bows at the back. She wears a white mob cap with a large red ribbon tied at the front.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Yukari_Weapons: Yukari spends most of her time sleeping in her home on the northeast border of Gensokyo. She sleeps twelve hours a day, is active only from dusk to late night, and hibernates in winter.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_The_Key_Of_: In the Outer World state: −30% friendly fire, +15% skill level, and the two most recently commanded crew gain +10% attack speed.
In the Outer World state: +10% attack speed.
In the Inner World state: +30% friendly fire, −15% max health, +20% damage dealt.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_The_Key_Of_Dual: A key that switches between the Inner and Outer Worlds, usable only by Yukari.
infotexts.entitydescription.Merry_gear: Maribel Hearn is a near-future university student and a member of the paranormal “Secret Sealing Club.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Merry_Plus: Maribel Hearn is a near-future university student and a member of the paranormal “Secret Sealing Club.”
infotexts.talentdescription.MerryTalent: While wearing Merry's Outfit+: −‖color:gui.red‖15%‖end‖ movement speed and −‖color:gui.red‖15%‖end‖ max health. ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack damage‖end‖ −‖color:gui.red‖25%‖end‖. Immune to psychosis effects. All magic weapons gain her exclusive weapon effect. The following effects alternate every ‖color:gui.green‖240‖end‖ seconds: Dream: +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖. Mission experience +‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖. When the crew's average HP is above ‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ and, based on current ‖color:gui.orange‖magic ability‖end‖, attack damage +‖color:gui.green‖up to 25%‖end‖ (caps at magic 200). Reality: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max health‖end‖. Allows thermal vision within ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ meters. If not the highest-level crewmate, all damage taken −‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. —————————————————————————— When unconscious, gain ‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖ resistance to ‖color:gui.yellow‖oxygen deprivation and blood loss‖end‖, and all crewmates gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ movement speed, extra health, and skill levels.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Hifuu_Club_Merry: Merry has slightly wavy shoulder-length blonde hair. She wears a purple, white-collared top and skirt, a white frilly hat, and white socks.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Hifuu_Club_Weapons: The classical definition of matter does not exist in this world.
infotexts.entitydescription.Renko_gear: Renko Usami is a near-future university student and a member of the paranormal “Secret Sealing Club.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Renko_Plus: Renko Usami is a near-future university student and a member of the paranormal “Secret Sealing Club.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Renko_Hat: A top hat tied with a white ribbon that stabilizes the wearer’s thoughts.
infotexts.entitydescription.Renko_Veil: A shawl perfect for exploration; when Renko wears it, movement speed increases by 10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.RenkoTalent: While wearing Renko's Outfit+: −‖color:gui.red‖15%‖end‖ movement speed and −‖color:gui.red‖15%‖end‖ maximum health. ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack damage‖end‖ −‖color:gui.red‖25%‖end‖. Immune to psychosis effects. All magic weapons gain their own exclusive weapon effect. When searching shipwreck or ruin containers, ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ chance to find ‖color:gui.yellow‖Izanagi Matter or Aether Layer Metal‖end‖. Based on your ‖color:gui.orange‖medical skill‖end‖, gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖, up to ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. When starting or finishing a mission with Merry and completing all tasks while level >‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖, obtain ‖color:gui.yellow‖“Red Spot Bestiary”‖end‖. Reading ‖color:gui.yellow‖“Red Spot Bestiary”‖end‖ triggers random effects (may all trigger or none): 1. All crew gain +‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ point in every skill and +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ skill gain speed. 2. A random crewmate gains +‖color:gui.green‖500‖end‖ XP and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ skill levels. 3. Self gains +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ skill levels and +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ maximum health. —————————————————————————— When afflicted with “Impending Danger,” Renko’s talent debuffs are inverted into equivalent buffs, and she remains conscious even when health drops below 0.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Hifuu_Club_Renko: Renko has shoulder-length dark-brown hair, mostly straight with slight waves at the ends. She wears a black round hat with a white ribbon bow.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Red_Spot_Fr: +10% skill level and +50% skill gain speed.
infotexts.entitydescription.Kokoro_gear: Kokoro is a Menreiki, a tsukumogami formed from 66 masks once used by Qin Kawashiro after being left unattended for ages.
infotexts.entitydescription.Kokoro_Plus: Kokoro is a Menreiki, a tsukumogami formed from 66 masks once used by Qin Kawashiro after being left unattended for ages.
infotexts.entitydescription.Kokoro_Mask01: A fox mask with a faint, ambiguous smile, containing rich emotions.
infotexts.entitydescription.Kokoro_Mask02: A half-face fox mask with a faint, ambiguous smile, containing rich emotions.
infotexts.talentdescription.KokoroTalent: While wearing Kokoro's Outfit+: All skills −‖color:gui.red‖10‖end‖; reduce ‖color:gui.red‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed, attack damage, physical resistance, and max health‖end‖. Grabbing high-max-health non-mechanical creatures may let you learn new emotions (each creature once, up to 66 total). Once per minute, you can spend one learned emotion to switch to one of four main emotions for the rest of the mission: Joy: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ movement speed and attack speed. Anger: −‖color:gui.red‖24%‖end‖ attack speed, +‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ ranged damage, +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ melee damage. Sorrow: −‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ damage taken, +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ max health. Pleasure: +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ skill level, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ stun resistance, immune to ‖color:gui.yellow‖psychosis‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Expressive_Pokerfa: Kokoro has long pink hair down to her waist. A mask floats at the left front of her head, representing her current mood.
−24% attack speed, +25% ranged damage, +50% melee damage.
+20% skill level, +10% stun resistance, immune to psychosis effects.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Kokoro_Weapons: Although each mask holds a fixed emotion, Kokoro typically uses only the Joy, Anger, Sorrow, and Pleasure masks in daily life.
infotexts.entitydescription.Ema_gear: She is one who ought to be loathed, and the person who despises her the most is herself.\nWearing it unlocks the Plus-Outfit talent.
infotexts.entitydescription.Ema_Plus: She is one who ought to be loathed, and the person who despises her the most is herself.
infotexts.entitydescription.Ema_Hat: A small hat decorated with cherry blossoms.
infotexts.talentdescription.EmaTalent: While wearing Ema's Outfit+: ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical resistance‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ −‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. Each ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ magic ability grants +‖color:gui.green‖0.25%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max health‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖0.2%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖friendly fire damage‖end‖. When health >‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖: Nearby crewmates gain +‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ skill gain speed and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ experience gain, while your damage taken −‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. Taking damage increases ‖color:gui.yellow‖Witchification progress‖end‖. When health less than ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, ‖color:gui.yellow‖Witchification progress‖end‖ also increases. At ‖color:gui.green‖100%‖end‖ progress (once per mission), gain Witchification: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ movement speed, +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ attack damage, and +‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖ extra health. Damage to creatures with Witch Factor +‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖. Gain experience upon any kill, up to ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ times per mission. Consuming ‖color:gui.green‖level-3+‖end‖ food or drinks can prematurely end Witchification. If Witchification ends naturally, suffer heavy penalties: ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack damage‖end‖ −‖color:gui.red‖30%‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ −‖color:gui.red‖40%‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖max health‖end‖ −‖color:gui.red‖50%‖end‖, and mission XP −‖color:gui.red‖90%‖end‖. Attacking enemies applies Witch Factor.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Ema_The_Loathed_On: A witch is nothing to fear! With everyone working together, we can prevail!
infotexts.entitydescription.Lilywhite_gear: She is the fairy who delivers spring. As a fairy, she is not very dangerous and not aggressive.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lilywhite_Plus: She is the fairy who delivers spring. As a fairy, she is not very dangerous and not aggressive.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lilywhite_gear_Black: She is the fairy who delivers spring. As a fairy, she is not very dangerous and not aggressive.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lilywhite_Plus_Black: She is the fairy who delivers spring. As a fairy, she is not very dangerous and not aggressive.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lilywhite_Headband: A decorative headband for Lily White’s hat.
infotexts.talentdescription.LilywhiteTalent:
When wearing Lily White Outfit+: –‖color:gui.red‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖
+‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖swim speed‖end‖ Slowly recovers from ‖color:gui.yellow‖oxygen deprivation‖end‖ After being attacked, briefly reduces the attacker’s ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖ When HP is below ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖, incoming damage –‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ Using ‖color:gui.orange‖herbal medicine or candy‖end‖ on any creature grants +‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ HP for one round Grants nearby players a buff: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ medicine effectiveness, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖opioid addiction, drug addiction, and oxygen deprivation resistance‖end‖. This buff is not enhanced by the ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Alliance‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Spring_Bearer_Fair: She has golden hair and wears a white conical hat with a folded brim lined with red zigzag patterns.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Lilywhite_Weapons: Lily White senses details unnoticed by ordinary people, delivering the message of approaching spring to creatures still in hibernation. Wherever this fairy passes, the warmth of spring follows.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Memory_Relation: Can be refined at the alchemy table using alchemical materials. Efficiency greatly improves if the related manual can be found.
infotexts.entitydescription.MRE_Material: Each ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ progress counts as one stage; each stage requires different materials for refinement. When full, using it on the corresponding character's health screen unlocks an additional talent. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Each character can use it only once‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Reimu: Effective only with Reimu Outfit+. Grants exclusive weapon effect. Each time hit, 15% chance to avoid that damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Remilia: Effective only with Remilia Outfit+. Exclusive weapon damage +15%. Higher bleeding increases damage up to 30%.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Marisa: Effective only with Marisa Outfit+. Bullet damage +20%.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Aya: Effective only with Aya Outfit+. Each melee attack has 5% chance to deal +50% damage; ranged bullets deal +25% instead.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Youmu: Effective only with Youmu Outfit+. Melee attack speed +20%. With Roukanken and Hakurouken, damage +30%, damage taken −30%.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Nitori: Effective only with Nitori Outfit+. Exclusive weapon: +20% attack damage, +15% max health and +10% movement speed when fully equipped.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Akyuu: Effective only with Akyuu Outfit+. Skill level +20%. Enemies damaged by you take +30% damage when below 30% HP.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Mokou: Effective only with Mokou Outfit+. Max health +30%. The higher your HP, the higher your damage (up to +20%).
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Patchouli: Effective only with Patchouli Outfit+. With exclusive weapon, damage taken −15%. With magic ≥300, damage taken −15% more.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Tenshi: Effective only with Tenshi Outfit+. With exclusive weapon: +30% stun resistance. After killing any creature with it, +30% melee attack speed and +15% ranged attack speed briefly.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Momizi: Effective only with Momiji Outfit+. After being hit, next attack damage +15%; if HP <50%, effect doubles.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Yuka: Effective only with Yuuka Outfit+. Laceration damage +25%, blunt damage +50%.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Aunn: Effective only with Aunn Outfit+. In Komainu form: damage +20%. In Lion form: damage taken −20%.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Flandre: Effective only with Flandre Outfit+. Damage taken −15%. Exclusive weapon attacks have 4% chance to instantly kill enemies with Eye of Destruction or below 50% HP (chance doubles in melee).
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Nue: Effective only with Nue Outfit+. Each time you take damage, stores it to empower your next attack up to +50% damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Piece: Applies only when wearing the Clownpiece Outfit+. While afflicted with Madness, incoming damage is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖, and attacks have a ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ chance to reduce friendly-fire damage by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Cirno: Effective only with Cirno Outfit+. Once per mission, when not in water and HP drops below 0, remain conscious and alive for 10s.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Koishi: Effective only with Koishi Outfit+. Deals +51.4% damage to targets marked by Strange Phone with HP >70%.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Alice: Effective only with Alice Outfit+. When Doll Energy >50%, max health +25% and attack damage +10%. Summoning dolls grants +30% physical and burn resistance for 20s.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Sunny: Effective only with Sunny Outfit+. Other Three Fairies’ outfit effects apply directly (excluding Star’s long-term self-heal).
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Luna: Effective only with Luna Outfit+. Killing any creature (non-turret) grants temporary HP, which also grants up to +20% movement speed, attack speed, and skill levels.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Star: Effective only with Star Outfit+. When taking damage, 30% chance to gain a random buff (10s cooldown): 1. Temporarily increase attack damage 2. Temporarily increase stun resistance 3. Briefly become undetectable by enemies 4. Greatly increase movement speed 5. Deal AoE damage and cause a small explosion 6. Temporarily increase physical and burn resistance for yourself and all fairy-class crew 7. Leave a starlight trap dealing continuous damage for 10s
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Sakuya: Effective only with Sakuya Outfit+. Blood Clock and Moon Clock gain additional effects: When Blood Clock <50%: +10% physical, burn, and stun resistance. When Blood Clock >50%: +15% attack damage. Attacking targets with Moon Clock <50%: 30% chance bleeding converts to internal damage (20% rate). Attacking targets with Moon Clock >50%: +15% attack damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Sanae: Effective only with Sanae Outfit+. With a Miracle active, +25% damage to non-human enemies; otherwise +30% max health and −15% damage taken.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Reisen: Effective only with Reisen Outfit+. While aiming ranged weapons: +10% move speed, −25% spread, −20% damage taken, +15% gunshot damage, and adds psychosis effect.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Yukari: Effective only with Yukari Outfit+. Gradually increases resistance to damage types you receive, up to +15%; at max, your damage of that type +15% (only physical, burn, and Phoenix Burn from base/mod).
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Kokoro: Effective only with Kokoro Outfit+. Each time you switch a primary emotion, chance to gain other emotions, with no limit.
infotexts.talentdescription.MRE_Lilywhite: Applies only when wearing Lily White Outfit+. Each 1 point of Magic Ability increases Max HP by 0.2%, up to a maximum of 40%. When Magic Ability exceeds 120, grants an additional 20 Max HP.
